social_posts.post_text: On theme @_jarrettprice @heytamararey

Lo Howlers. With book six out this summer, I‘ve another treat headed your way. 

FORBIDDEN SONG from @dynamitecomics is coming out March 29th. The third installment in the Sons of Ares graphic novels, it’s by far my favorite of the trilogy. A dash of Les Miserables, a twist of Ocean’s Eleven, and a full shot of heartfelt Fitchner au Barca mayhem—all rendered by the beautiful new art of @kewberbaal This one lights the fuse that leads to the Reaper and features some of my favorite little devils: Nero, Kavax, Karnus au Bellona…and did I mention the sexy new art!?

Support your local comics shop and be sure to ask to order you a copy. It’s their last day to do so. links in bio. 

#redrising 
#dynamitecomics

Sample Scene #2 - Eo’s Song
Out tomorrow

#lightbringer

I'm pleased to reveal the poster that will be featured in the B&N exclusive edition of LIGHT BRINGER. Artwork by Irina Kuzmina. Preorder the B&N exclusive edition via the link in my bio. 

If you preorder any edition of LIGHT BRINGER from B&N, you’ll be automatically entered into the Ultimate Howler Sweepstakes! One winner will receive a signed copy of the book, the Red Rising board game, Howler merch from @litescalates, and a $100 B&N gift card. @barnesandnoble

🦦 June 738 PCE
#redrising

Red Rising audio drama part two is now available to assail your ears. Pax au Telemanus!!

Link in bio

Lo’ Howlers! I’m delighted to announce that @litescalates and I have cooked up HowlerCon 2023 as a part of my official Light Bringer tour! The rest of the tour details will be available soon, but this special event need a little bit of an early bump. Tickets via link in profile.

Part book launch and part mini con, this one-of-a-kind event is a collaboration between @magiccitybooks and @litescalates . HowlerCon 2023 take place at @cainsballroom in Tulsa, OK, and will feature not only your regular book tour elements of a talk and signing, but also in true Lit Escalates fashion, a whole heap of other epic goodness. 

Taste “Peerless Gold”, a Limited Edition Red Rising themed beer created for this event by the master brewer at @cabinboysbrewery.

Listen to your very own Howler Band, the one and only @melikebees.

Participate in the first ever official Red Rising Cosplay competition, Hosted by Alexis Lampley of @nerdyink and judged by yours truly.

Live Red Rising Screen Printing by @flashfloodprint.

Exclusive event-only merchandise… and more!

Generously supported by the @tulsaartistfellowship

Calling all Howlers! Submit your preorder receipt for LIGHT BRINGER by @piercebrownofficial to receive exclusive digital wallpapers and bundled slingBlade 3D printer files from Orange Armory. Head to the link in our bio to claim this offer!

Offer open until July 25, 2023. US only, 18+.
Once more unto the breach. LIGHT BRINGER event tickets link in bio

Lo’ Howlers. While I’ve been polishing my gravboots for Light Bringer’s release and carving my way into book seven, the master makers at @litescalates have been hard at work in the forges creating something for you. I’ve been wanting to make these since I first wrote Red Rising. With your help, we can finally make that happen. Link in profile!
Where under the gaze of Sol could we be headed in LIGHT BRINGER? a teaser of what’s to come in July. Illustrated by @joeldanielphillips at @litescalates
between books I bathe, hike, have friends. Behold proof. on film. Now buy my book

Wish I could make it to every city in which Howlers reside. Until my teleporter arrives, here’s the next best thing. Anyone in US Canada can sign up & will receive a signed book in the mail plus an exclusive map. When you sign up, you can also submit a question for me to possibly answer live. Will do my best to answer as many as possible. Xo link in bio
13 days until Light Bringer; some rest and hydration before the tour. #3 ode to Sevro

Howlers–there will be a limited amount of early hardcover copies of LIGHT BRINGER available to purchase from the PRH Book World booth at SDCC (7/19-7/23.) While supplies last. Limit one copy per customer per day. Stop by the PRH Book World booth to get your copy before anyone else!
 
 Also, join me for the Science Fiction (At Least For Now) panel on Saturday, 7/22 from 1 PM to 2 PM. I’ll be signing books in the Autograph Area shortly after the panel.
 
Swipe for my complete SDCC signing schedule! Signing is limited to two items per person.

‌| ‌‌‌‌‌‌#redrising & #irongold persian edition |

نشر باژ با خرید حقوق قانونی نویسنده منتشر می‌کند:
مجموعه #زرین_پولادتن
 از حماسه #قیام_سرخ
نویسنده: #پیرس_براون
مترجم: #مهنام_عبادی
طرح جلد: #امین_منصوری
(با دریافت تاییدیه‌ی پیرس براون)
لوگوتایپ: #حامد_میرزامحمدی
(قطع وزیری، جلد سخت)

📖پشت جلد زرین پولادتن 
او را پدر، آزادی‌بخش، جنگ‌سالار و دروگر می‌خوانند اما آن‌هنگام که با زره سرخ، سپاهی پرتعداد و قلبی سنگین به‌سوی سیاره‌ی آبی و کمرنگ شیرجه‌ می‌زند، حس می‌کند پسربچه‌ای بیش نیست. دهمین سال جنگ و سی‌ودومین سال زندگی اوست... 
یک دهه‌ پیش، دارو قهرمان انقلابی بود که به باور او می‌توانست زنجیرهای جامعه‌ی سلطنتی زرّین‌ها را بشکند اما قیام هر چه بود و نبود، از بین برد و به جای صلح و آزادی، جنگی بی‌پایان به آدمیان هدیه داد. حال، دارو باید هر آنچه را به خاطرش جنگیده است، در آخرین مأموریت بَری از امید خود به خطر بیندازد. او هنوز از صمیم قلب باور دارد که می‌تواند همه را نجات دهد اما آیا موفق می‌شود دست‌کم خود را نجات دهد؟ 
در این حین، در سراسر گیتی‌ها، سرنوشت انسان‌ها به‌هم گره می‌خورد تا تقدیر دارو برای همیشه عوض شود... 

📌 قیام سرخ داستان به پایان‌رسیدن جهان را روایت می‌کرد اما زرّین پولادتن، داستان خلق جهانی نوین است. بنشینید به خواندن آغاز این حماسه‌ی بی‌نظیر و تازه، حماسه‌ی مصیبت و پیروزی به قلمِ پیرس براون، نویسنده‌ای چیره‌دست با آثاری جزوِ فهرست پرفروش‌ترین‌های نیویورک‌تایمز.‌
‌
💬 شما این مجموعه رو خوندین؟ اگر یک جمله به پیرس براون بخواید بگید (به انگلیسی)، اون چیه؟ توی کامنت برامون بنویسید و پیرس براون رو تگ کنید. 🥰

The bill comes at the end.

Clang clang clang

🐺
@adamforgash

The man, the myth, the pillar that held up the sky has crossed into the great beyond. I was 23 when I met Jake. He took a meeting with me as a favor to a mutual friend. Thirty minutes of ping pong conversation about Robert Heinlein, Isaac Asimov, Larry Niven, George Orwell later, he asked to represent me as my lawyer and I slipped under the wing of a roaring griffin—the only mentor I’ve ever known. After representing George Lucas since Star Wars was a seed of an idea, he was already a legend with no need for new clients. I was zilch. 23, unpublished, a kid with a book, a bad haircut, and too skinny jeans. He believed in me and became my own Lorn au Arcos. There are people you meet with virtues, but Jake possessed virtue itself. Unfailingly loyal, he was an aegis against schemers, a barometer to detect bullshitters, the only man to call me babe and mean it, a cheerleader before I had a single reader, a kind friend to teach me how to walk the moral path, take my poor ass to dinner, and make me feel seen and valued in the jungle of Los Angeles. Above all, he believed in family and he and his wife Ruth welcomed me into theirs. I’ll miss him but goddamn was I blessed to know him.

Lit Escalates has lured me away from the battle for Mars for a surprise signing and print release at NYCC. Details below, xoxo.

Saturday Oct 14th, 1PM - 2PM
Booth #1481

Limited Edition Red Rising Map Print
24x18 inches
Signed Screen Print with Glow-in-the-Dark Ink
Edition of 400

Please note: Due to time constraints, signings will be limited to in-booth purchases only. Prints will be available starting at the signing time on a first come first serve basis until sold out.

This event is not ticketed, so if you choose to line up early please be courteous to other fair goers and line folk!
#1 nyt bestseller
